name: Game Jam 2
description:
https://play.unity.com/mg/other/bubblegum-turn-on-sound

Game made for my second game jam. Learned about animating sprites and created my own music!

Find the portal before time runs out and you pop! Gumballs add 3 seconds but expand the bubble, causing it to pop after 4 gumballs. Controls: Left/right arrow keys to move, up arrow key to jump/double jump. Use Bubblegum's stickiness to hop off/up sides of walls. Bubble pop sound repeats when the timer hits zero, it plays normally in the Unity Editor so I'm not sure why it is doing that here. Art citations: Character: https://opengameart.org/content/slime-monster-24x24
Tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-tilesets
Scene2 Background: https://opengameart.org/content/simple-sky-background
Bubble pop sound: https://opengameart.org/content/bubbles-pop
Gumball collect sound: https://opengameart.org/content/level-up-power-up-coin-get-13-sounds
Music by me using Garageband
